tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Malaysia is culturally diverse, with Malay, Chinese, Indian, and indigenous influences seen in its cuisine, festivals, and traditions.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The country boasts natural beauty, from tropical rainforests and stunning beaches to iconic landmarks like the Petronas Twin Towers.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Malaysia is renowned for its delicious cuisine, offering diverse flavors in dishes like nasi lemak, rendang, and satay.
